ðŸ“– Summary: Unstract is a no-code LLM platform designed to structure unstructured documents. It provides tools to launch APIs and ETL pipelines, enabling users to automate complex business processes involving documents. The platform features a Prompt Studio for efficient prompt engineering and a Workflow Studio for building automated workflows with human-in-the-loop capabilities.
